data.title: Speed Geography
data.meta_description: Can you name the answers to the geography questions in the time limit? Test your knowledge on this geography quiz and compare your score to others.
data.text:
QuestionAnswer Name a country beginning with 'N'? In which American state is the Grand Canyon? Name a famous building in Paris? Which of these seas is the largest: Red, Dead or North? What are Niagara, Angel and Victoria all examples of? On which continent is Bhutan? What is the capital of Portugal? The river Nile runs through which capital city? How many American states are there beginning with 'T'? Which country's flag depicts a red maple leaf on a white background? Madagascar is an island off the coast of which continent? How many countries are there in South America? Which of these countries is the smallest: Monaco, San Marino or Liechtenstein? In which country is the tallest mountain (above sea level) in the world? What is the name of that mountain? Odd one out: St. Basil's Cathedral, Lenin's Tomb or The Brandenburg Gate? Which city has the largest population: Hanoi, Beijing or New Delhi? Alsace and Lorraine are regions of which European country: France, Belgium or Luxembourg? Kilimanjaro is a mountain in which country: Kenya, Tanzania or Uganda? Name a country that borders Nigeria? In the expression 'across the pond' which ocean does 'the pond' refer to? True or False:The largest land-locked country in the world is Bolivia? What are Etna, Vesuvius and Mauna Loa examples of? Was the Zuiderzee natural or man-made? Name a country that starts with 'A' and doesn't end with 'A'?

QuestionAnswer Name a country in the Caribbean? What is the name of the canal that connects the Atlantic and Pacific oceans in Central America? Madrid is the capital of which country? How many countries end in '...stan'? A 'Twister' is an informal name for which natural disaster? What is the predominant religion in Iran? Which of these cities is the most northerly:Canberra, Jakarta or Helsinki? Name a country that lies on the Greenwich Meridian (0 degrees longitude)? Name a country that borders Guyana? How many countries are there beginning with 'D'? At which pole can you see the Aurora australis? In which country is 'The Great Barrier Reef'? Which tropic is further south: Cancer or Capricorn? Which is the only country in the world to still have an emperor? Superior, Eyre and Titicaca are all examples of what? What is the largest non-polar desert in the world? Over which ocean does the climate pattern 'El Nino-Southern Oscillation' occur? What is the name of the World's deepest oceanic trench: Kermadec, Kuril or Mariana? If a Hurricane travels west of the dateline, what does it become: A Cyclone, a Storm or a Typhoon? On which island are the Moai statues?
